name: Danny Derobot
description:
Controls:

ALL PLAYERS:
Pause: Escape
Restart Level: Enter
Go through portal: Space

Player 1:

Movement: WASD
Firing: Q,E

Player 2:

Movement: 8,4,5,6 (NUMPAD)
Firing: 7,9(NUMPAD)

Player 3:

Movement: IJKL
Firing: IP

Players 1-4 on Xbox 360 controller:

Movement: Left Stick
Pause: Start
Restart level: Back
Shoot: RB & LB
